hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came out on 'Id (the festival day). He first offered the prayer and then delivered the sermon . He then went to women, taking Bilal with him. The narrator Ibn Kathir said: The probable opinion of Shu'bah is that he commanded them to give alms. So they began to put (their jewellery)

chapter.eng-name: The Khutbah On The Day Of 'Eid
